lines.text: Yes, I am. And it's marvelous! Half my life I've been a soldier. Five campaigns, four scars, a shattered hip. And all that time, the Army's been my wife. A mean, old, possessive, insatiable, glorious bitch! And tonight I am cheating on her. And it's wonderful. Like picking flowers on a battlefield!
Anything goes when people meet for the last time.
What does an honest man do in a dishonest situation?
I don't like this segregation of the sexes. Men are pigs, but after 10pm, they are absolutely indispensable. Non?
